attributes.action: Concentrate on helping decent honest people live safe lives and change the law away from favouring criminals and the like
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Habitual criminals in this country are laughing at our judicial system. The law seems to be on the side of the criminal with no thought to the victim.  Police have no rights to question known criminals even if it seems similar to their own MO.  When they do eventually secure a case, then the criminal 'gets off' with a fine (more often than not paid by the tax payer by the benefit system) or community service - leaving them to have a great laugh at the Police and public and carry on breaking the law - ENOUGH IS ENOUGH!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
